reviews.text: Hotel Valladolid is just off the Cathedral and one of the main plazas of Morelia. I stayed here on a Saturday night, but my room was free of street noise (but not free of the noise from my neighbours).
reviews.title: Really well located, clean and kind.

likes.disliked: — Lack of air in the room, noise from the corridor

reviews.title: Hospitality and flexibility were amazing
reviews.text: The rooms are modern and clean. Quite small, but OK size in comparison with European hotels in which I stayed before.

reviews.title: Not Impressed
reviews.text: The hotel does not offer breakfast, but just outside of the hotel there are plenty of places to eat, overlooking the beautiful cathedral.
